job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtSelby Jennings is working with a Dallas based investment manager on an incredibly exciting opportunity They are looking to bring on MLData Engineers with a focus on Natural Language Processing and building ML algorithmsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtYoud be one of the first hires in their Data Innovation and Insights team giving you the opportunity to take ownership and make a tangible impact on the firm Further details to come upon your applicationltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWhat you haveltpgtltulgtltligt15 years of experienceltligtltligtStrong programming experience in Python ltligtltligtExtensive experience in Natural Language ProcessingltligtltligtKnowledge of regressions classification algorithms decision trees random forests and neural networksltligtltligtData scrubbingcleaning experienceltligtltligtKnowledge of data streaming Tensorflow Spark Kafka and AWS are nice to haveltligtltulgt
